name: The Emergence of Abstract and Episodic Neurons in EMRL
desc: Introduces an episodic variant of the Harlow visual fixation task and use it as a test-bed to reveal two classes of neurons that emerge in the agent's working memory when trained using episodic meta-RL. Accepted at the Learning to Learn Workshop.

name: Adapting MARBERT for Improved Arabic Dialect Identification
desc: In this paper, we tackle the second Nuanced Arabic Dialect Identification (NADI) shared task and succeed in achieving state-of-the-art results on all of its four subtasks. The aim is to distinguish short utterances of both Dialectical and Modern Standard Arabic at both the country-level and province-level.

name: Episodic Meta-RL on the Two-Step and Harlow Tasks
desc: Reproduces the results of animal behavior and artificial agents on both the Two-Step and Harlow tasks using an episodic meta-RL computational model that combines three fully-fledged RL systems inspired from the machine learning and neuroscience literature.

name: Deep Diacritization
desc: Published in the Proceedings of the The Fifth Arabic Natural Language Processing Workshop - co-located with COLING'2020. The work proposes a novel architecture for automatically restoring Arabic diacritics that outperforms previous SOTA methods and is orders of magnitude faster in training and inference time.
tags: NLP, Python, PyTorch, Arabic NLP, DD, Diacritization

name: Video Search using Natural Language
desc: Enabling users to search long untrimmed videos for segments semantically correlating with input queries in natural language

name: Sketch Back
desc: Sketch inversion of faces and building sketches using deep convolutional neural networks

name: Eigen Faces
desc: Facial Detection and Recognition using Singular Value Decomposition

name: Scripty
desc: Scripty is an Amazon Alexa skill that teaches children how to code using voice commands.

name: Korastak
desc: Document sharing platform called Korastak (means: Your Notebook in Arabic) for students in my univresity to be able to share notes easily with each other

name: MIPS R400 Pipelined Simulator
desc: Online assembler and simulator for the MIPS ISA.

name: Doum Trivia Bot
desc: True or False trivia game on Facebook Messenger Bot for Doum Cultural Foundation

name: Assembler & Simulator
desc: Online assembler and simulator for the ARM-Thumb ISA. Support many features including debugging and GFX display

name: Graph Builder
desc: Web application for graph lovers: build customizable graphs or use pre-sets and run algorithms (DFS,BFS) on them

name: Quicky: Chrome Extension
desc: Quicky is a chrome extension that allows you to share links and quick posts on the fly

name: PhotoGenerator
desc: Generating a selected image using a selected number of images, made using Processing

name: Snake-حنش
desc: Re-imagined snake game using ProcessingJS. One of my first projects that I am really proud of, done before joining university
